attributes.action: keep ibex gymnastics training at lasswade
attributes.additional_details:
Gracemount Ibex Gymnastics Club is a womens artistic club, with girls aging from 5-16+.

Ibex have trained at Lasswade Centre facilities, in Midlothian, for 10 years and this lease has now been withdrawn, with no reasons given and any correspondence from the club is being ignored.

Girls represent their club in a number of events throughout the UK.

This sudden change to the training schedule has put the future in doubt with many girls and coaches unable to commit to the new training schedule.
